data.title: High school football players in the U.S. 2021/2022
data.meta_description: The combined number of male and female participants playing traditional American football at high school level in the United States declined significantly in 2021/2022 versus the pre-COVID-19 years.
data.text:
11-player football participation in U.S. high schools 2009-2022, by gender
